experiences.description:
This is a company in the civil construction and real estate sector.

In it, I was responsible for creating several new features, such as a comprehensive inventory management system with input and output controls, another for managing incoming leads, as well as improvements to the legacy code, bug resolution, and minor features.

My responsibilities also extended to the most critical areas of the business, where I made improvements to the company's budget system, covering analysis, calculations, extraction of relevant data, and generation of reports, all automatically for the financial team.

I also highlight the complete revitalization of the site's front-end, migrating to React.js and making it responsive. I also had the opportunity to participate in the development of a mobile application in React Native, aimed at direct customer experience.
